{{Navbox |name = File systems |title = [[File system]]s |listclass = hlist
|group1 = Disk |list1 = {{Navbox subgroup |list1 = * [[Advanced Disc Filing System]] * [[AdvFS]] * [[Be File System|Be File System (BFS)]] * [[Btrfs]] * [[CrossDOS]] * [[Disc Filing System|Disc Filing System (DFS)]] * [[Episode filesystem|Episode]] * [[Encrypting File System|EFS]] * [[exFAT]] * [[Extended file system|ext]] ** [[ext2]] ** [[ext3]] ** [[ext3cow]] ** [[ext4]] * [[File Allocation Table|FAT]] ** [[FAT12]] ** [[FAT16]] ** [[FAT16B]] ** [[FAT32]] * [[Files-11]] * [[Hierarchical File System|Hierarchical File System (HFS)]] * [[HFS Plus]] * [[High Performance File System]] * [[IBM General Parallel File System]] * [[JFS (file system)|JFS]] * [[Macintosh File System]] * [[MINIX file system|MINIX]] * [[NetWare File System]] * [[NILFS]] * [[Novell Storage Services]] * [[NTFS]] * [[QFS]] * [[QNX4FS]] * [[ReiserFS]] ** [[Reiser4]] * [[SpadFS]] * [[UBIFS]] * [[Unix File System]] * [[Veritas File System|Veritas File System (VxFS)]] * [[File Allocation Table#Long file names|VFAT]] * [[Write Anywhere File Layout|Write Anywhere File Layout (WAFL)]] * [[XFS]] * [[Xsan]] * [[ZFS]] * ''[[List of file systems#Disk file systems|more...]]''
|group2 = [[Optical disc]] |list2 = * [[High Sierra Format|HSF]] * [[ISO 9660]] * [[ISO 13490]] * [[Universal Disk Format|UDF]]
|group3 = [[Flash memory]] / [[Solid-state drive|SSD]] |list3 = * [[File Allocation Table|FAT]] * [[exFAT]] * [[CHFS]] * [[Transaction-Safe FAT File System|TFAT]] * [[Flash file system|FFS2]] * [[F2FS]] * [[JFFS]] * [[JFFS2]] * [[LogFS]] * [[Non-Volatile File System|NVFS]] * [[YAFFS]] * [[UBIFS]]
|group4 = [[Distributed file system|Distributed]] |list4 = * [[Coda (file system)|Coda]] * [[CXFS]] * [[GFS2]] * [[Google File System]] * [[OCFS2]] * [[QFS]] * [[Xsan]] * ''[[List of file systems#Distributed file systems|more...]]'' }}
|group2 = [[Network-attached storage|NAS]] |list2 = * [[Andrew File System|AFS]] * [[OpenAFS]] * [[Apple Filing Protocol|AFP]] * [[Distributed File System (Microsoft)|DFS]] * [[IBM General Parallel File System|GPFS]] * [[Google File System]] * [[Lustre (file system)|Lustre]] * [[NetWare Core Protocol|NCP]] * [[Network File System (protocol)|NFS]] * [[POHMELFS]] * [[Hadoop]] * [[HAMMER]] * [[Server Message Block|SMB (CIFS)]] * [[SSHFS]] * ''[[List of file systems#Distributed file systems|more...]]''
|group3 = Specialized |list3 = {{Navbox subgroup |list1 = * [[cramfs]] * [[Filesystem in Userspace|FUSE]] * [[SquashFS]] * [[FAT filesystem and Linux|UMSDOS]] * [[UnionFS]] * ''[[List of file systems#Special purpose file systems|more...]]''
|group2 = Pseudo- and virtual |list2 = * [[configfs]] * [[Device file|devfs]] * [[procfs]] * [[specfs]] * [[sysfs]] * [[tmpfs]] * [[WinFS]]
|group3 = Encrypted |list3 = * [[EncFS]] * [[Encrypting File System|EFS]] * [[ZFS]] }} }}<noinclude> [[Category:Computing templates]] </noinclude>
